markers.label: Acutami
markers.description: Also known as Relerisstith in previous versions of the game and in the campaign.

markers.label: Draconis Mortis
markers.description: This dragon is accessible either by going through caves or by jumping to the island.

markers.label: Loromir
markers.description: This dragon is not hostile.

markers.label: The Riddle in the Desert
markers.description: The correct urn to choose during the quest is the one on the far right. This quest may potentially break other quests like "The Painting" or "Whispers in the Wind" in a way that they will no longer be able to be completed. There may be more affected quests so it is advised to leave this quest for later in the game.

markers.label: Scout Post
markers.description: It's the first quest out of 4 quests from the commander.

markers.label: Settlers of the Desert
markers.description: It's the second quest out of 4 quests from the commander.

markers.label: The Lost Settlers
markers.description: It's the third quest out of 4 quests from the commander.

markers.label: Evacuation
markers.description: It's the fourth quest out of 4 quests from the commander. You can later find the settlers in Bellevue, they will thank you but won't give any reward.

markers.label: Dragon Scale
markers.description: As a reward for this quest, you get a unique item Scale of a Dragon. The quest giver turns into a blacksmith after completing the quest.

markers.label: The Missing Mother
markers.description: The quest giver is not marked with a white dot on the minimap.

markers.label: Arogarn the Forest Ranger
markers.description: This quest needs to be completed first before the "Arogarn's Sword" quest.

markers.label: Messenger
markers.description: After completing the quest, you can go back to Sandra (the quest giver) to get additional reward which has a relatively high chance to be an item from the Icons set.

markers.label: Where is the Blacksmith?
markers.description: As a reward for this quest, you get a unique sword Hack. This is a pre-requisite quest before the third quest from the Unknown Warrior series, "Jacquaire's Revenge".

markers.label: Goods Messenger
markers.description: The quest giver turns into a merchant after completing the quest, creating the so-called Bravemart.

markers.label: Jacquaire's Battle Uniform
markers.description: It's the second quest out of 3 quests from the Unknown Warrior series. Make sure to cross the bridge between Mascarell and Tyr-Fasul to spawn Jacquaire in Braverock.

markers.label: Magical Thistle
markers.description: After completing the quest and talking to Tussock again, he's going to turn into a merchant. Doing "Boris Richfield" before this quest may result (especially when in single player) in a bug where Tussock is missing when trying to end the quest, causing it to be impossible to complete.

markers.label: Moca the Minotaur
markers.description: If you accept the minotaur's offer during the quest, he can later be used as a companion. When the region is at peace (after completing most side quests in the area), you can come back to him and he will join your party. If he dies, he becomes available to join again in the Bellevue garrison.

markers.label: The Rescue of a Noble Lady
The Snow Hare
markers.description: The quest giver is not marked with a white dot on the minimap.

markers.label: Dreamer of Winters
markers.description: To spawn the quest giver, you have to walk through one of the entrances to Bravewall.

markers.label: Finding the Document of a Decree
The Gypsy Camp
markers.description: You need to wait for the quest giver to walk to the camp to be able to talk to her and finish the quest.

markers.label: Inquisition Plans
markers.description: You need to walk around the edge of the fort to avoid being seen, otherwise the quest fails.

markers.label: Arogarn's Sword
markers.description: This quest is only available if you have already completed "Arogarn the Forest Ranger" in Bellevue.

markers.label: The Female Dragonslayer
markers.description: It's the first quest out of 3 quests from Loromir series.

markers.label: Toothpick for a Dragon
markers.description: It's the second quest out of 3 quests from Loromir series.

markers.label: Brother of the Dragon
markers.description: It's the third quest out of 3 quests from Loromir series. As a reward for this quest, you get a magic item Orbus Dracos.

markers.label: Children's Bugbear
markers.description: The quest giver is not marked with a white dot on the minimap.

markers.label: Antidote
markers.description: You need to kill Tarantula Medialis, not Tarantula Gravis like the NPC says.

markers.label: Panem et Circensis
markers.description: This is a pre-requisite quest to get to Azschabrag Swamps. In order to be able to get there, you need to win at least 5 rounds. The maximum number of rounds is 9.

markers.label: Tomb Raiders: Treasure Hunters Inc.
markers.description: It's the first quest out of 3 quests from Swamps of Azschabrag series. You need to win at least 5 rounds in the arena during "Panem et Circensis" beforehand. You will also need to pay 100.000 gold to start the quest.

markers.label: The Forgotten Swamps of Azschabrag
markers.description: It's the second quest out of 3 quests from Swamps of Azschabrag series. It can only be completed after finishing the next quest, "H'Runga'zz".

markers.label: H'Runga'zz
markers.description: It's the third quest out of 3 quests from Swamps of Azschabrag series. You need to accept Goblin's offer to successfully complete the quest.

markers.label: Blockade Breaker of the Trade Embargo
markers.description: The quest giver turns into a blacksmith after completing the quest.

markers.label: The Missing Pet
markers.description: The quest giver is not marked with a white dot on the minimap.

markers.label: The Camp of the Undead
markers.description: This quest is only available during the campaign. You need to accept the gatekeeper's offer to get this quest.

markers.label: Boris Richfield
markers.description: Doing this quest may cause "Magical Thistle" to be impossible to complete (especially when in single player) due to a bug where the NPC disappears. In such case, make sure to complete "Magical Thistle" first.

markers.label: Pony Express
markers.description: This quest is only available during the campaign after escorting Vilya to Tyr-Fasul and letting Shareefa open the portal to Ahil-Tar. The quest has a time limit (for instance, to get to the first destination you have about 90 seconds) so you will need to hurry up.

markers.label: Pure Water
markers.description: If you accepted the Rapso's offer, you can drink the antidote to get rid of the poison effect.

markers.label: Special Flavor
markers.description: Quest item name doesn't appear when using "Alt" key, it doesn't appear either when hovering over the item but the item is visible on the minimap as a yellow dot.

markers.label: Whisky Supplier
markers.description: By doing "Pure Water" beforehand and collecting all 6 whiskey casks there, you can glitch the game and you will be able to sell them to any barman/innkeeper infinitely for 1k gold each - you won't be able to complete this quest though.

markers.label: Jacquaire's Revenge
markers.description: It's the third quest out of 3 quests from the Unknown Warrior series. You need to complete "Where is the Blacksmith?" in Bellevue beforehand. This is where Jacquaire typically is but you may need to walk around Mystdale to find him. As a reward for this quest, you get a unique sword The Finished Prototype of the Sword.

markers.label: Love Token
markers.description: After completing the quest, the quest giver can be found in the Oasis of Ahil-Tar and you can talk to him to get a small reward.

markers.label: Hidden Merchant
markers.description: The quest giver turns into a merchant after completing the quest.

markers.label: Glubba-Jar
markers.description: This quest is only available during the campaign. The quest becomes available after getting the Element of Void. This quest ends on the bridge a bit before the quest marker.

markers.label: Blackrobes
markers.description: Don't let the priests finish the ritual as this will cause the quest to fail.

markers.label: The Book of Wisdom
markers.description: The quest giver turns into a combo master after completing the quest.

markers.label: Abduction of the Women of Slater's Grave
The Outlaws of Slater's Grave
markers.description: As a reward for this quest, you get a unique sword Albion if you accept the Robert's offer.

markers.label: Bounty Hunt
markers.description: This is not a quest that appears in the quest log and there are no quest markers on the in-game map. Check the wanted sign to see what is the next target and refer to "Bounty Hunt Target" markers on this map to help you find them. There are 21 targets and their order is random. After killing all targets, talk to Richford to get a unique amulet Ancarian Medal of Honor as well as 2 skill points and 2 attribute points.

markers.label: The Unknown Warrior
markers.description: It's the first quest out of 3 quests from the Unknown Warrior series. After completing the quest, make sure to cross the bridge between Mascarell and Tyr-Fasul to spawn Jacquaire in the next location in Braverock.

markers.label: The Plains of Tyr-Hadar
markers.description: You need to start this quest to be able to access Tyr-Hadar.

markers.label: Unexpected Aid
markers.description: This quest can only be started before killing all 3 priestesses in "The Plains of Tyr-Hadar".

markers.label: Grandmother's Ring
markers.description: The quest giver is not marked with a white dot on the minimap.

markers.label: Buried Slaves
markers.description: To be able to start the quest, you need to kill nearby Guards and pick up the Cell Key.

markers.label: The Book of Wisdom
markers.description: It's the fifth quest out of 5 quests from The Path to Becoming a True Warrior series. There is a cartoon at the end of this quest. As a reward for this quest, you get a unique weapon for Battle Mage, Book of Wisdom, as well as 2/4/6 skill and attribute points depending on how many guardians you kill at the exact same time.

markers.label: Salvation of the Doomed
markers.description: The quest giver turns into a combo master and the other nearby NPC turns into a merchant after completing the quest.

markers.label: Arachnophobia
markers.description: You need to keep right while in the temple and keep left after leaving the temple, the quest can be replayed as many times as you want.

markers.label: Dwarven Treasure (1 of 4 starting locations)
markers.description: The quest begins after killing Extraordinary Demon and reading the note it drops. This is one of 4 locations where it may spawn. After reading the note, head to the Burial Chamber which is a cave located east from the Cemetery, just next to it.

markers.label: Dwarven Treasure (1 of 4 starting locations)
markers.description: The quest begins after killing Extraordinary Demon and reading the note it drops. This is one of 4 locations where it may spawn. After reading the note, head to the Burial Chamber which is a cave located east from the Cemetery, just next to it.

markers.label: Dwarven Treasure (1 of 4 starting locations)
markers.description: The quest begins after killing Extraordinary Demon and reading the note it drops. This is one of 4 locations where it may spawn. After reading the note, head to the Burial Chamber which is a cave located east from the Cemetery, just next to it.

markers.label: Dwarven Treasure (1 of 4 starting locations)
markers.description: The quest begins after killing Extraordinary Demon and reading the note it drops. This is one of 4 locations where it may spawn. After reading the note, head to the Burial Chamber which is a cave located east from the Cemetery, just next to it.

markers.label: Dwarven Uprising on the Cemetery
markers.description: Keep opening the graves and killing Dwarf Ghosts until the Dwarf King appears.

markers.label: The Squire
markers.description: It's the first quest out of 5 quests from The Path to Becoming a True Warrior series.

markers.label: Valuable Giblets - Hornet / Battle of Powers - Hornet
markers.description: It's the first quest out of 3 (Valuable Giblets) or 4 (Battle of Powers) quests from the series. Gladiator, Battle Mage, Seraphim, Wood Elf and Dwarf get Valuable Giblets version of the series while Dark Elf, Daemon and Vampiress get Battle of Powers version. At the end of the quest, quickly click on the NPC while he's teleporting away to talk to him and immediately get to know his next location.

markers.label: Conspirator's Reward
markers.description: It's the fourth quest out of 4 quests from Intrigues series which is only available for Dark Elf, Vampiress and Daemon. As a reward for this quest, you get 1 skill point.

markers.label: The Monster in the Forest
markers.description: It's the fourth quest out of 5 quests from The Path to Becoming a True Warrior series. You can only hurt the golem with Weapon of Legends from the previous quest, nothing else works.

markers.label: A New Leader
markers.description: It's the third quest out of 4 quests from Intrigues series which is only available for Dark Elf, Vampiress and Daemon.

markers.label: Freedom for the Haduk
markers.description: This quest is only available for Gladiator, Battle Mage, Seraphim, Wood Elf and Dwarf. As a reward for this quest, you get 1 skill point.

markers.label: Fresh Meat
markers.description: This quest is only available for Dark Elf, Vampiress and Daemon.

markers.label: Intrigues
markers.description: It's the first quest out of 4 quests from Intrigues series which is only available for Dark Elf, Vampiress and Daemon.

markers.label: Messenger of Evil
markers.description: It's the second quest out of 4 quests from Intrigues series which is only available for Dark Elf, Vampiress and Daemon.

markers.label: The Sacrificial Stone
markers.description: It's the fourth quest out of 4 quests from The Missing Brother series. As a reward for this quest, you get 1 skill point.

markers.label: The Weapon of Legends
markers.description: It's the third quest out of 5 quests from The Path to Becoming a True Warrior series. You will need the Weapon of Legends to be able to complete the next quest from the series.

markers.label: The Master
markers.description: It's the second quest out of 5 quests from The Path to Becoming a True Warrior series.

markers.label: The Missing Brother
markers.description: It's the first quest out of 4 quests from The Missing Brother series.

markers.label: The Seer
markers.description: It's the second quest out of 4 quests from The Missing Brother series.

markers.label: Rescue Mission to the Nuk-Nuk
markers.description: It's the third quest out of 4 quests from The Missing Brother series.

markers.label: Where is the Mother?
markers.description: It's the first quest out of 2 quests from Scared Child/Mother.

markers.label: Mokhva Blood
markers.description: It's the second quest out of 2 quests from Scared Child/Mother.

markers.label: Valuable Giblets - Mire Worm / Battle of Powers - Mire Worm
markers.description: It's the second quest out of 3 (Valuable Giblets) or 4 (Battle of Powers) quests from the series. Gladiator, Battle Mage, Seraphim, Wood Elf and Dwarf get Valuable Giblets version of the series while Dark Elf, Daemon and Vampiress get Battle of Powers version. At the end of the quest, quickly click on the NPC while he's teleporting away to talk to him and immediately get to know his next location.

markers.label: A Brother in Need
markers.description: It's the first quest out of 2 quests from A Brother in Need series.

markers.label: Escort to the South
markers.description: The quest giver turns into a merchant after completing the quest.

markers.label: The Missing Child
markers.description: It's the first quest out of 2 quests from the mother. As a reward for this quest, you get 1 skill point.

markers.label: Scorpion Poison
markers.description: It's the second quest out of 2 quests from the mother.

markers.label: Abducted
markers.description: The quest is triggered after picking up the note from the ground. After this, the quest giver appears next to you.

markers.label: Death to the Dead
markers.description: It's the second quest out of 2 quests from A Brother in Need series.

markers.label: Pirate Treasures
markers.description: This quest is only available for Daemon.

markers.label: Remembrance
markers.description: This quest is only available during the campaign. As a reward for this quest, you get 1 skill point.

markers.label: New Potions
markers.description: This quest is only available during the campaign. It's the first quest out of 2 quests from Jab. Quest item name doesn't appear when using "Alt" key, it doesn't appear either when hovering over the item but the item is visible on the minimap as a yellow dot.

markers.label: Crab Cocktail
markers.description: This quest is only available during the campaign. It's the second quest out of 2 quests from Jab.

markers.label: Sebastian's Instruments
markers.description: This quest is only available during the campaign. It's the first quest out of 3 quests from Sebastian.

markers.label: Rum for the Binge
markers.description: This quest is only available during the campaign. It's the second quest out of 3 quests from Sebastian.

markers.label: Pirate's Binge
markers.description: This quest is only available during the campaign. It's the third quest out of 3 quests from Sebastian.

markers.label: The Farmer's First Prank
markers.description: The quest giver is not marked with a white dot on the minimap. As a reward for this quest, you get 1 skill point and 1 attribute point. To spawn the NPCs for this quest, you need to walk through the south-western end of the bridge.

markers.label: Free the Slaves
markers.description: This is not a quest that appears in the quest log. Kill all Mokhva guards and speak to the Haduk. As a reward for this quest, you get 1 skill point.

markers.label: Valuable Giblets - Insect Larva / Battle of Powers - Insect Larva
markers.description: It's the third quest out of 3 (Valuable Giblets) or 4 (Battle of Powers) quests from the series. Gladiator, Battle Mage, Seraphim, Wood Elf and Dwarf get Valuable Giblets version of the series while Dark Elf, Daemon and Vampiress get Battle of Powers version. In case of Valuable Giblets, the quest giver turns into a merchant after completing the quest.

markers.label: Battle of Powers - Never Trust a Demon
markers.description: It's the fourth quest out of 4 quests from the Battle of Powers series. This quest is only available for Dark Elf, Daemon and Vampiress. The third Mokhva that you need to kill in this quest, Teppic, can be found in Dwarven Ruins where the first quest ("Battle of Powers - Hornet") from this series started.

markers.label: Cookies for the Marquis
markers.description: You need to complete "A Demon Called Mirkon" subquest before being able to complete this one.

markers.label: A Demon Called Mirkon
markers.description: This is a subquest from "Cookies for the Marquis", will start another subquest "Mirkon" if you accept to help him.

markers.label: Mirkon
markers.description: This is a subquest from "A Demon Called Mirkon", which starts if you accept to help Mirkon.

markers.label: Monastery of the Seraphim Personal Stash
Southern Core Region Bosses
markers.description: 6501 kills required. 2x Acutami, 2x Lorinor.

markers.label: Northern Core Region Bosses
markers.description: 6501 kills required. 1x Acutami, 1x Stygian Eldar, 2x Dryad Huntress, 1x Dryad Druid.

markers.label: Desert Region Bosses
markers.description: 7501 kills required. 2x Sirithicam, 2x D'Cay, 2x Crab Queen.

markers.label: Swamp Region Bosses
markers.description: 4501 kills required. 1x Acutami, 3x Mountain Giant, 1x Giant Burning Arachnid, 1x H'Runga'zz.

markers.label: Lava Region Bosses
markers.description: 4501 kills required. 2x Anducar Elite Guard, 4x Demon Lord.

markers.label: Shaddar-Nur Region Bosses
markers.description: 2501 kills required. 2x Sakkara Demon, 2x Demon Lord, 2x Sakkara Priest.

markers.label: Northern Region Bosses
markers.description: 5501 kills required. 2x Cerebropod, 2x Demon Lord, 2x Insect Larva Queen.

markers.label: Lower Underworld Region Bosses
markers.description: 6501 kills required. 1x Acutami, 3x Anducar's Elite Guard, 2x Cerebropod.

markers.label: Upper Underworld Region Bosses (first group)
markers.description: 6501 kills required. 1x D'Cay, 1x Skeleton Mage, 2x Nuk-Nuk Champion. This is 1 of 2 boss groups that you need to kill to successfully clear the region.

markers.label: Upper Underworld Region Bosses (second group)
markers.description: 6501 kills required. 1x Sirithcam, 1x Lorinor, 2x Karissall, 2x Dryad Druid. This is 1 of 2 boss groups that you need to kill to successfully clear the region. This group doesn't appear on your map and you can only get to the island with Daemon.

markers.label: Cave Entrance
markers.description: This cave is glitched on the map and appears to be cut out but it can be safely explored in game.

markers.label: Cave Entrance
markers.description: You can very easily do a region boss here in multi player (you can use self hosted LAN server). By going in and out tenths of times, the ghosts outside of the cave will multiply. They will always have lvl1 so you can easily kill them (AoE damage helps a lot). It is also a good place to farm items for low level characters.

markers.label: Pong Cave Entrance
markers.description: The portal becomes active after completing the Underworld campaign.

markers.label: Babylon 5 Cave Entrance
markers.description: The hidden path to the platform leads through the trees, northwest from the entrance.

markers.label: Mines Secret Cave Entrance
markers.description: In the campaign, the door needs to be unlocked by Gargaduk.

markers.label: Cave Entrance
markers.description: To be able to go through the portal, you need to start the quest by talking to the NPC next to the portal.

markers.label: Dropoff Point
markers.description: The teleport will drop you here.

markers.label: Cave Entrance
markers.description: After teleporting to Ancaria, the quest will complete and you won't be able to go back to this cave anymore.

markers.label: Cave Entrance
markers.description: The gate will be locked until you defeat nearby dragon, Sirithcam.

markers.label: Pacman Cave Entrance
markers.description: The hidden path to this cave leads through the woods, northeast from the entrance.

markers.label: Cave Entrance
markers.description: To open the portal you need to kill the magician guarding it first.

markers.label: Bellevue Arena Entrance
markers.description: It is only accessible for Gladiator at the start of the campaign.

markers.label: Bellevue Arena Entrance
markers.description: It is only accessible for Gladiator at the start of the campaign.

markers.label: Master Vampiress Cave Entrance
markers.description: The door leading to this entrance will be locked unless you are playing as Vampiress (you need to talk to the NPC staying in front of the door).

markers.label: Verag-Nar Cave Entrance
markers.description: In the campaign, you need to complete the main quest "The Dams of the Dwarves of Gnarlstat" to be able to enter the cave.

markers.label: Cave Entrance
markers.description: In the campaign, you need to complete the main quest "The Dams of the Dwarves of Gnarlstat" to be able to enter the cave.
